mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Users (user_no, id, password, name, phone, grade, is_leave, status, secession) VALUES (seq_Users.nextVal, #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{grade}, #{isLeave}, #{status}, #{secession})
mapper.select: select name from users where id=#{id}

SELECT user_no as UserNo, id, password, name, phone, grade, is_leave as isLeave, status, takeover_code as takeoverCode, recent_login as recentLogin, session_key as sessionKey, session_limit as sessionLimit, secession FROM Users
